channel.title: Reputation on moparscape forums went down for me
channel.description: cya i will come back to help but for now no stupid people think i leeched because i got hacked...

item.title: Reputation on moparscape forums went down for me
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

Wow. Seroiusly. If you get bullied at your school and the bully wants 2m from you… that’s just… lmao dude.

Ok so let’s put this straight.
You + Bully = Not good
You + RS = Not good
Bully + RS + ???Lol???

Sorry, I had to get that out… it’s just way too funny man. Who get’s bullied for rs money… or at all. I mean if you get bullied, why are you just not doing anything about it. You said “you can’t get 2m fast enough” well don’t. Dammit don’t be scared him. He’s a bully who wants RuneScape money. Stick up for yourself, and as a last resort, make fun of him that he plays RS. He’ll care enough.

Anyways… ontopic:
Don’t quit because you lost “reputation” on a forum. Get it back, earn it back, I don’t care. But leaving for something like that is just pathetic. I don’t mean to flame you, but seriously, just becuase you got called a “leecher” and you get eMessages on a forum, you get hurt that much on the inside? Lots of people are eFlamed everyday - and they don’t quit what they’re doing and what they like to do. Get over it.

Read full topic
item.source: Reputation on moparscape forums went down for me

item.title: Reputation on moparscape forums went down for me
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

What kind of ‘tough guy’ is he? So what if he’s tall. I was the third shortest in my year, no-one started shit with me. Just head-butt them in the balls. At the end of the day, no-one picks on someone that fights back. BTW, don’t leave. You’ve helped me loads.

Read full topic

item.title: Reputation on moparscape forums went down for me
item.dc:creator: @god_of_ikiliki god of ikiliki
item.description:
@god_of_ikiliki wrote:

[quote=“zilchuary, post:11, topic:161854”][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=220228.msg1908337#msg1908337 date=1196546608]
No reason to leave really lol.
I were hacked and the hacker posted an announcement with a virus in it.
Did I leave?
[/quote]
But my point is i get over 90 messages saying leecher u leeched from so and so
so i aint putting up with abuse only if it stops il come back[/quote]Just temp. disable PM’s or block their PM’s lol.
Otherwise ignore and delete their messages.
I get enough of those everyday, I ignore them.

Read full topic
